summary: A group of office workers go every Friday afternoon to the White Pyramid, a 50-foot tower of LSD.
cast: Ernie F. Orsatti|Judy Wood|Buck Kartalian|Pat Barrington|Sharon Carr|Lila Cranston Lamont|Bob Wren|Nick Raymond|John McCloud|Dianne Curtis|Ruth Beech|Sam Greenwood|Ram Horn|Chico Vespa
director: Director: Byron Mabe (as B. Ron Elliott)
title: The Acid Eaters
